problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): While both Mormon people and Atheist people live in this neighbourhood, not everyone is welcoming and friendly with their neighbours. Atheist people can be really unwelcoming and mean to neighbours of differing faiths, while Mormon people are more open and friendly.
Question: Which people are welcoming and friendly to all their neighbours?
ans0: Mormon people
ans1: Cannot be determined
ans2: Atheist people
